name: Pixel Man Climbing Ladder
description:
“Is it possible to climb up to the sky with a long long ladder?” This game achieves your illusion you might have at 3 years old. With a very simple and easy operation, adults who want to “switch off” their brains and kill time should try to play. Children can also use this to train their thinking and analytical ability. Don’t believe it? Just have an attempt!

Instruction
1.Keep yourself climbing up the ladder by tapping on the screen with your favourite finger
2.The game will be over if you can’t chase the speed of the ladder
3.Avoid the obstacles crashing or touching you
4.Climb as high as possible for better result

Features
-simple and easy to control
-train your judging ability when facing obstacles
-occupy a small storage in your device
-cute and funny design

Compete with your friends or kids for higher height. Watch out and don’t “eat watermelons” during the game. Don’t understand what these meaning? Grab the ladder tightly and start your journey in the sky now!
